summary: A texture change to make the horse Frost live up to his/her name a bit more
descriptionHtml:
I made the texture for the horse Frost a bit whiter.

To get Frost do this quest:
http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Promises_to_Keep

The file goes in:
%steamlocation%\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\horse

To make frost invincible like Shadowmere, go to console with `/~ and enter:
setessential 0009CCD7 1
author: stroot
